/*

section .text

global _start

section .data
msg db 'hello Udhay',0xa
len equ $ -msg

section .text
_start:

mov edx,len
mov ecx,msg
mov ebx,1
mov eax,4
int 0x80
mov ebx,0
mov eax,1
int 0x80

*/

/*
udhay@udhay-virtual-machine:~/Advanced-C/Asm_ELF$ xxd -a hello
00000000: 7f45 4c46 0101 0100 0000 0000 0000 0000  .ELF............
00000010: 0200 0300 0100 0000 8080 0408 3400 0000  ............4...
00000020: c800 0000 0000 0000 3400 2000 0200 2800  ........4. ...(.
00000030: 0400 0300 0100 0000 0000 0000 0080 0408  ................
00000040: 0080 0408 a200 0000 a200 0000 0500 0000  ................
00000050: 0010 0000 0100 0000 a400 0000 a490 0408  ................
00000060: a490 0408 0c00 0000 0c00 0000 0600 0000  ................
00000070: 0010 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000  ................
00000080: ba0c 0000 00b9 a490 0408 bb01 0000 00b8  ................
00000090: 0400 0000 cd80 bb00 0000 00b8 0100 0000  ................
000000a0: cd80 0000 6865 6c6c 6f20 5564 6861 790a  ....hello Udhay.
000000b0: 002e 7368 7374 7274 6162 002e 7465 7874  ..shstrtab..text
000000c0: 002e 6461 7461 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000  ..data..........
000000d0: 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000  ................
000000e0: 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000  ................
000000f0: 0b00 0000 0100 0000 0600 0000 8080 0408  ................
00000100: 8000 0000 2200 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000  ...."...........
00000110: 1000 0000 0000 0000 1100 0000 0100 0000  ................
00000120: 0300 0000 a490 0408 a400 0000 0c00 0000  ................
00000130: 0000 0000 0000 0000 0400 0000 0000 0000  ................
00000140: 0100 0000 0300 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000  ................
00000150: b000 0000 1700 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000  ................
00000160: 0100 0000 0000 0000  
*/
/*

udhay@udhay-virtual-machine:~/Advanced-C/Asm_ELF$ hexdump -C hello
00000000  7f 45 4c 46 01 01 01 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  |.ELF............|
00000010  02 00 03 00 01 00 00 00  80 80 04 08 34 00 00 00  |............4...|
00000020  c8 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  34 00 20 00 02 00 28 00  |........4. ...(.|
00000030  04 00 03 00 01 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 80 04 08  |................|
00000040  00 80 04 08 a2 00 00 00  a2 00 00 00 05 00 00 00  |................|
00000050  00 10 00 00 01 00 00 00  a4 00 00 00 a4 90 04 08  |................|
00000060  a4 90 04 08 0c 00 00 00  0c 00 00 00 06 00 00 00  |................|
00000070  00 10 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  |................|
00000080  ba 0c 00 00 00 b9 a4 90  04 08 bb 01 00 00 00 b8  |................|
00000090  04 00 00 00 cd 80 bb 00  00 00 00 b8 01 00 00 00  |................|
000000a0  cd 80 00 00 68 65 6c 6c  6f 20 55 64 68 61 79 0a  |....hello Udhay.|
000000b0  00 2e 73 68 73 74 72 74  61 62 00 2e 74 65 78 74  |..shstrtab..text|
000000c0  00 2e 64 61 74 61 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  |..data..........|
000000d0  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  |................|
*
000000f0  0b 00 00 00 01 00 00 00  06 00 00 00 80 80 04 08  |................|
00000100  80 00 00 00 22 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  |...."...........|
00000110  10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  11 00 00 00 01 00 00 00  |................|
00000120  03 00 00 00 a4 90 04 08  a4 00 00 00 0c 00 00 00  |................|
